temporal_data.temporal_significance: 2 months BEFORE Dec 2024 middle batch - provides crucial context for career transition

user_questions.text: Can you help me come up with a plan to find a high paying fulfilling job? Consulting? Entrepreneurship?
user_questions.timeline: needs job by January 2025 (current contract ends Dec 13, 2024)

user_statements.text: I'm currently consulting with the UN through the ITC (international trade center) developing a curriculum for sustainable reconstruction in Mosul Iraq - I fly to iraq and conduct it all in arabic
user_statements.reveals: International development expertise, Arabic fluency, sustainable reconstruction

user_statements.text: I have a network, except I don't know how to activate it - I've been in fellowships/retreats, parts of multi year community building programs with the wellbeing project
user_statements.context: Has valuable connections but unsure how to leverage them
user_statements.reveals: Wellbeing Project connection (Aaron Hurst!), community building programs

user_statements.text: successful? I have many workshops, I do them mostly for free
user_statements.reveals: Gives value away, undervalues own work financially

user_statements.text: I've never really had a job, I've only started businesses - although I do need better paying jobs than the businesses and non-profits that I start myself
user_statements.reveals: Core tension between autonomy and financial stability

user_statements.text: i have a us passport and a french wife and I can live in the EU
user_statements.reveals: Can work in US or EU, married to French woman

user_statements.text: in December I'll need a job right now I am consulting till Dec 13th. New year new job sounds good haha
user_statements.context: Active job search, contract ending soon

concepts.name: Post-Traumatic Growth through Social Entrepreneurship
concepts.definition: Using pain and challenges as raw material for growth - not just personal but for families, communities, society
concepts.bilal_approach: Entrepreneurship as fostering agency and purpose, not just in business but in life

concepts.name: Islamic Economics + Baraka (Spiritual Blessing)
concepts.definition: Economics not just about systems/markets but about their SOUL - bringing back baraka (deep spiritual blessing) to economic activity
concepts.scope: Not only relevant to Muslims but profoundly needed by world at large
concepts.goal: Reimagine root of human transactions and relationships in commerce
concepts.connection_to_barakanomics: This is the FOUNDATION for Dec 2024 Barakanomics book proposal

concepts.name: Humor as Key to Cognitive Flexibility
concepts.definition: Humor disrupts rigid patterns, helps people (especially trauma survivors) find new ways of seeing, thinking, being
concepts.significance: Not just coping mechanism but form of wisdom - living lightly amid heaviness

concepts.name: Bridge-Builder Identity
concepts.external_validation: Colleague reflection describes this as core identity

values.name: Entrepreneurial Identity (vs Employee)
values.evidence: 'I've never really had a job, I've only started businesses'
values.tension: Needs better income than own businesses provide

values.name: Mission Over Money (Giving Value Away)
values.evidence: 'I have many workshops, I do them mostly for free'

values.name: Transformation Not Merely Improvement
values.evidence: 'You're not content with simply making things better—you're aiming for transformation at a fundamental level'

values.name: Healing as Rediscovering Wholeness
values.evidence: 'Healing is not about fixing what is broken but about rediscovering wholeness, both individually and collectively'
values.context: Applies to ourselves, communities, systems, relationship with earth

tensions.name: Entrepreneurial Autonomy vs Financial Stability
tensions.pole_a: Never had job, only started businesses (autonomy, mission)
tensions.pole_b: Need better paying work than own nonprofits provide (stability)
tensions.notes: This is THE core tension driving Dec 2024 'consulting vs small business' dilemma

tensions.name: Mission-Driven Free Work vs Charging What He's Worth
tensions.pole_a: Runs workshops mostly for free (mission, generosity)
tensions.pole_b: Needs income, asks for high-paying fulfilling job

tensions.name: Has Network But Can't Activate It
tensions.pole_b: 'I don't know how to activate it' (blindspot)
tensions.opportunity: Learning to leverage network could solve income problem

beliefs: Transformation requires honoring both individual and collective
Economics should have soul (baraka, spiritual blessing)
Post-traumatic growth happens through agency and entrepreneurship
Humor is wisdom, not just coping - living lightly amid heaviness
Systems we create to help can become barriers if taken rigidly
Ancient wisdom + modern innovation = needed synthesis
Healing is about wholeness, not fixing broken pieces
Identity as entrepreneur (not employee) is core to who I am
mental_models: Islamic economics as soul of systems

blindspots: How to charge what he's worth
decision_making_patterns.preferences: Contract/interim over permanent, entrepreneurship over employment
decision_making_patterns.values_hierarchy: Transformation > improvement, autonomy > stability, giving > receiving

for_instance_1_origins: When did Bilal first work with The Wellbeing Project? (Oct 2024: 'multi year community building programs')
When did Bilal marry Joséphine? (Oct 2024: 'french wife' mentioned)
When did Islamic economics + baraka concept first appear? (Oct 2024: well-developed, likely earlier origin)
When did post-traumatic growth + entrepreneurship synthesis begin?
When did sustainable reconstruction work begin? (ITC contract active Oct 2024)
When did Bloom.pm start? (Oct 2024: still active, co-founder)
for_instance_2_outcomes: Did Bilal find a high-paying job for Jan 2025? (Oct 2024: urgent search)
Did ITC contract end on Dec 13, 2024 as planned?
Did he learn to activate his network?
Is Bloom still active in Nov 2025? (Instance 2 found: NOT mentioned - did it end?)
Did Wellbeing Project collaboration deepen? (Instance 2 found: YES, major VX collaboration with Aaron Hurst)
Did he start charging for workshops vs giving them away free?
cross_validation: ✅ Joséphine = French wife (Oct 2024) → Joséphine Lesaffre, Nur Coop co-owner (Instance 2, Nov 2025)
✅ Wellbeing Project connection (Oct 2024) → Aaron Hurst VX collaboration (Instance 2, Nov 2025)
✅ Islamic economics + baraka (Oct 2024) → Barakanomics book proposal (Instance 3, Dec 2024)
❌ Bloom active (Oct 2024) → NOT mentioned in Nov 2025 (Instance 2) - What happened?

notes: CRITICAL TIMELINE PIECE: This Oct 2024 conversation explains THE core tension driving Dec 2024 consulting vs small business dilemma. Bilal's ITC contract ends Dec 13, 2024, creating urgent need for income by Jan 2025. Two months later (Dec 2024 middle batch), he's still wrestling with same tension but now considering Barakanomics book as potential path. MAJOR VALIDATIONS: (1) Joséphine = French wife confirmed, (2) Wellbeing Project multi-year connection confirmed (Aaron Hurst), (3) Islamic economics + baraka is 2+ months old idea by Dec 2024, not sudden. MYSTERY: Bloom active Oct 2024, NOT mentioned Nov 2025 (Instance 2) - what happened between Oct 2024 and Nov 2025? EXTERNAL VALIDATION: Colleague's profound reflection gives us EXTERNAL theory of mind - how others perceive Bilal vs how he sees himself. BLINDSPOT IDENTIFIED: 'I don't know how to activate my network' - has valuable connections but can't leverage them for income. MISSION VS MONEY TENSION: Runs workshops for free, needs high-paying work - core undervaluation pattern.
